The bedsheet is obtained from the innkeeper of Port Phasmatys during the Ghosts Ahoy quest to be given to Robin Hood in a nearby room. It is worn in the head slot.

Although it is brown when received, it can be changed to a light green colour by covering it in ectoplasm, making it an ectoplasm-covered bedsheet. To do this, players must dip it into the pool of slime on the bottom floor of the cavern beneath the Ectofuntus or dip it into a bucket of slime collected from the pool. Although this is supposed to make players resemble a ghost, when talking to residents of the port, they will merely joke at them.

When worn, the bedsheet makes the player resemble a classic "bedsheet" ghost. The bedsheet is not wearable in any other place than Port Phasmatys; attempting to do so will result in receiving a message, stating: "I'll only wear the bedsheet inside Port Phasmatys."

It is impossible to charter a ship while players are carrying a bedsheet.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Players cannot run while wearing a bedsheet.
  • Upon completion of the Ghosts Ahoy quest, players can still obtain another bedsheet via speaking to the innkeeper of Port Phasmatys.

The '''bedsheet''' is obtained from the [[Ghost innkeeper|innkeeper]] of [[Port Phasmatys]] during the [[Ghosts Ahoy]] quest to be given to [[Robin Hood]] in a nearby room. It is worn in the head slot.

Although it is brown when received, it can be changed to a light green colour by covering it in ectoplasm, making it an ectoplasm-covered bedsheet. To do this, players must dip it into the pool of slime on the bottom floor of the cavern beneath the [[Ectofuntus]] or dip it into a [[bucket of slime]] collected from the pool. Although this is supposed to make players resemble a ghost, when talking to residents of the port, they will merely joke at them.

When worn, the bedsheet makes the player resemble a classic "bedsheet" ghost. The bedsheet is not wearable in any other place than Port Phasmatys; attempting to do so will result in receiving a message, stating: "I'll only wear the bedsheet inside Port Phasmatys."

It is impossible to charter a ship while players are carrying a bedsheet.

==Trivia==
*Players cannot run while wearing a bedsheet.
*Upon completion of the Ghosts Ahoy quest, players can still obtain another bedsheet via speaking to the innkeeper of Port Phasmatys.
